Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19716842]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli standard and drug-resistant strains (MIC=5.0 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus standard strain (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), S. aureus drug-resistant strain (MIC=1.0 µg/ml), Bacillus dysenteriae standard strain (MIC=2.5 µg/ml), B. dysenteriae drug-resistant strain (MIC=5.0 µg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=7.5 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19716842]32 ± 7% hemolytic activity at 50 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptide against both Gram-positive, -negative and yeast. Also induces histamine release by mast cells and shows hemolytic activities against both human and rabbit red cells.

Literature.Title: Two novel antimicrobial peptides from centipede venoms.
Literature.Author: Peng K, Kong Y, Zhai L, Wu X, Jia P, Liu J, Yu H.
